body: It is better to use OP_REQUIRES_OK(). Please see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/3176ba990070cdde62b7cdf81747d70107d2e032/tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_fused_batch_norm_op.cc#L924 for an example.
body_html:

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_fused_batch_norm_op.cc

Line 924 in 3176ba9

OP_REQUIRES_OK(
for an example.
